creator: gregor@apache.org
text:

the same happens from the authoring area, but is masked by the generic expection
handler

The problem is that it cannot determine the doctype, cause it is using the
document type declaration which is removed by the addMetaData xslt. To fix this
we need to go for the xml schema and need to upgrade the SourceTypeAction.
creator: egli@apache.org
egli@apache.org
text:
Added the new SourceTypeAction to the lib dir and changed the
parameter-doctype.xmap to use the document-element namespace instead of the
document-declaration.
